data.name: Bank Bill Business Loan
data.description: Our most flexible loan for businesses looking to borrow more than $250,000 for acquisitions, capital investment or refinancing. Enjoy the benefit of a market linked rate with the simplicity of a term loan.

features.additionalInfo: Supported by specialist relationship managers, locally based in metropolitan and regional centres throughout Australia
Interest rates linked to the bank bill swap rate
Loan term from 30 days up to 30 years, depending on rate option chosen and security provided
Flexible repayment options - Interest only and principal, interest and fees
Westpac Bank Bill Business Loan rates are available on application. Margins may apply.
Lending establishment, service and other fees apply. Credit criteria, fees, charges, terms and conditions apply. Talk to your banker for product details.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Customer is - A business entity domiciled in Australia; or an individual 18 years and above or strata corporation domiciled in Australia and requires the funding for business or investment purposes other than investment in residential property.
